However, there is a growing trend for tech giants to publish advancements for recruitment and PR purposes. The technical literature and news indicate that GNNs are increasingly mature and have been successfully applied to recommendation tasks in research and smaller-scale production. There are also engineering blog ecosystems (e.g., Netflix TechBlog) which have previously disclosed algorithmic innovations.
